short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A global public art exhibition that showcases the work of First Nations artists in every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension transforms browsing experience by showcasing First Nations art.

Each new tab showcases a piece of artwork and history, creating a visually stunning and culturally enriching environment.

Key Features:

 * Integrated Google Search: A centralised search bar provides seamless access to Google search functionality, maintaining user workflow without leaving the tab.

 * Customisable Dark Mode: Toggle between light and dark modes to suit users visual preferences and enhance nighttime browsing comfort.

 * Secure Notes: Capture and store thoughts directly within the extension, leveraging secure browser storage for user convenience.

 * Personalised Shortcuts: Streamlined user workflow by allowing to add shortcuts to the most-visited websites, accessible with a single click.

Add artwork to the collection or Acknowledge artists: 
If you see a picture without any credit given, please email d.foley@barayamal.com with the information and a screenshot so we can add it as soon as possible (next update)!
